item.title: I need help with two things!
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Are you a admin in your server? or owner? because if the compiler doesnt say anything and you go in and type ::madskilzyo or ::maxstats and nothing happenes just either make your account admin… or owner… or take the && playerRights >= 2)

~HOW TO MAKE YOURSELF OWNER~

  1. goto your client.java
  2. Search for //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
  3. godown and one of the names in the “example” change it to your name that you have in your server.
  4. save + compile[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 08:05:32 PM[/size][hr]But you have a cheezescape one right? Dang i need to find a way to get cheezescape admins hang on i will help you.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 08:10:20 PM[/size][hr]Never mind maybe search the tut list i dont know… sorry here is the link to tut list: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,28002.0.html

@bryanc wrote:

  1. Are you useing TestScape? Tell me and i will help if you are useing testscape.
  2. Add this instead? else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("madskilzyo") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 7); addSkillXP(14000000, 8); addSkillXP(14000000, 9); addSkillXP(14000000, 10); addSkillXP(14000000, 11); addSkillXP(14000000, 12); addSkillXP(14000000, 13); addSkillXP(14000000, 14); addSkillXP(14000000, 15); addSkillXP(14000000, 16); addSkillXP(14000000, 17); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); addSkillXP(14000000, 19); addSkillXP(14000000, 20); addSkillXP(14000000, 21); addSkillXP(14000000, 22); addSkillXP(14000000, 23); addSkillXP(14000000, 24); sendMessage("Y0U CH3AT1NG BAST3RD."); }

item.title: I need help with two things!
item.dc:creator: @jason_x jason_x
item.description:
@jason_x wrote:

I have no clue if this has been posted before but i need help with two things.
The first thing is a added a shop and gave it items but when i open the shop it dosent show any items help would be appreciated.
and 2. I need this code turned into cheezscape pk source usable because i tried to use it and it wont work.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“maxstats”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(500000000, i);
sendMessage(“You recieve max levels.”);
}
}

Help will lead to modship and maybe adminship on my pk server thank you for your time.
